phases.name: Phase 1: Critical Fixes
phases.description: Address critical issues blocking production use

phases.name: Phase 2: Code Quality
phases.description: Improve code quality, consistency, and documentation

phases.name: Phase 3: Feature Expansion
phases.description: Add missing functionality and new features

phases.name: Phase 4: v0.4.0 Breaking Changes
phases.description: Remove deprecated code and make breaking changes (targeted for v0.4.0)

items.title: Add comprehensive test suite
items.description: Zero test files in entire codebase. Create *_test.go files for each package with >80% coverage target.

items.title: Fix hardcoded path in bulk_git_rm
items.description: cliutil/cmd/bulk_git_rm/main.go:15 contains hardcoded user-specific path. Should accept directory as command-line flag.

items.title: Update README for v81
items.description: README references go-github v68 but go.mod uses v81. Align documentation with actual version.

items.title: Extract pagination utility
items.description: Nearly identical pagination code exists in repo/list.go, release/release.go, and search/search.go. Create shared pagination helper to reduce duplication.

items.title: Add Unwrap() to AuthError
items.description: auth.AuthError doesn't implement Unwrap() unlike other custom error types. Add for Go 1.13+ error chain compatibility.

items.title: Make Query.Encode() deterministic
items.description: Query.Encode() iterates over map which has non-deterministic order. Sort keys before encoding to ensure consistent output.

items.title: Add cliutil package documentation
items.description: cliutil package has no package-level documentation comment. Add clear description of package purpose.

items.title: Improve fork async handling
items.description: EnsureFork uses hardcoded time.Sleep() without retries. Implement proper retry mechanism with exponential backoff.

items.title: Add release write operations
items.description: Release package only has read operations. Add CreateRelease, UpdateRelease, DeleteRelease functions.

items.title: Reduce external dependencies
items.description: gocharts pulled in just for table generation in search package. Consider moving table generation to separate subpackage or module.

items.title: Add branch protection operations
items.description: Add functions for managing branch protection rules.

items.title: Add webhook operations
items.description: Add functions for managing repository webhooks.

items.title: Standardize client initialization
items.description: Multiple ways to create clients exist (NewClient, NewClientWithToken, NewClientHTTP, NewGitHubClient). Document preferred approach and consider deprecating redundant factories.

items.title: Remove backward compatibility shims from root package
items.description: Remove deprecated re-exports from gogithub.go added in v0.3.0 for backward compatibility. Users should migrate to importing subpackages directly (auth/, search/, repo/, pr/, release/).

tasks.description: Remove Client type wrapper from root package
Remove NewClient() and NewClientWithToken() from root package
Remove Query, Issues, Issue type aliases
Remove SearchOpenPullRequests, SearchIssues, SearchIssuesAll wrapper methods

items.migration_guide: Replace imports: `import "github.com/grokify/gogithub"` â†’ `import "github.com/grokify/gogithub/auth"` and `import "github.com/grokify/gogithub/search"`. Use `auth.NewGitHubClient()` and `search.NewClient()` instead of `gogithub.NewClient()`.

items.title: Relocate misplaced constants to appropriate packages
items.description: Move constants currently in search/issues.go to more appropriate locations: bot user constants (UsernameDependabot, UserIDDependabot) to auth/ package, URL constants (BaseURLRepoAPI, BaseURLRepoHTML) to root package or new urls/ package.

tasks.description: Move UsernameDependabot, UserIDDependabot to auth/ package
Move BaseURLRepoAPI, BaseURLRepoHTML to appropriate location
Update internal imports to use new locations

content.value: gogithub is a Go client library for the GitHub API, providing high-level operations for authentication, search, repositories, pull requests, and releases.
This roadmap tracks improvements identified during code review to enhance code quality, test coverage, and feature completeness.
